author: sussman
msg: Optimization: make ra_dav updates issue a depth-1 PROPFIND on
directories, rather than issue both a GET and PROPFIND on each file.
[NOTE: this ra_dav optimization is only triggered by a new-style
report-response from the latest mod_dav_svn.  If either the client or
server is "old", this optimization won't happen.]
This is somewhat related to issue #1161 ("ra_dav makes too many
requests"), but mainly it's a precursor to making
attribute.  if present, do a depth-1 propfind and cache the results
in a hash indexed by vr-url.
(add_node_props): in the file case, check to see if parent
dir_item_t already contains the file's props.  in the dir case,
check the dir_item_t directly to see if its full props already
exist.  if they don't, fall back on calling __get_props_resource()
(add_props): take a prop hash as first argument, instead of a resource_t.
callers of add_props(): pass rsrc->propset instead of rsrc.

author: philip
msg: Issue 1142, make 'svn diff URL1@N URL2@M' work.

author: philip
msg: This is a new interface on the old backend, so with appropriate
arguments, the diff output is unchanged.  The new interface allows
working copy to branch comparisons, some of these work but sometimes
(svn_cl__options): Add --old and --new. Tweak diff-cmd, diff3-cmd and
(svn_cl__cmd_table): Rewrite diff help text, add --old and --new.
add --ignore-ancestry to diff and merge, add --strict to propget, add
